channel.title: Comments on: Prepping for Vacation – Tuesday, December 12, 2017

item.title: By: suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-234">Barbara Fitzgerald</a>.
Hi Barbara!
I will definitely pass your message on to my mom. We'll get her back to the casinos again. I am sure she'll LOVE the MGM!
Have a Merry Christmas! Kim
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Barbara Fitzgerald.

Hi Barbara!

I will definitely pass your message on to my mom. We’ll get her back to the casinos again. I am sure she’ll LOVE the MGM!

Have a Merry Christmas!
Kim

item.title: By: Barbara Fitzgerald
item.dc:creator: Barbara Fitzgerald
item.description: Hi, My thoughts and prayers are with both You and your family, for caring and taking such good care of your mom, and for a complete recovery for Sue B. I was one of her customers at Belleview beauty salon for maybe 12 years or so. We enjoyed many hours talking about our families and laughing about our similar experiences. I marveled at her exercise program etc. She has so much energy. I miss her lovely smile and conversations and I miss going to the salon. I wish you all a very Merry Christmas. Please tell your mom I think of her often and wish that we had the chance to go to the MGM casino..
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
My thoughts and prayers are with both You and your family, for caring and taking such good care of your mom, and for a complete recovery for Sue B.
I was one of her customers at Belleview beauty salon for maybe 12 years or so. We enjoyed many hours talking about our families and laughing about our similar experiences. I marveled at her exercise program etc. She has so much energy. I miss her lovely smile and conversations and I miss going to the salon.
I wish you all a very Merry Christmas.
Please tell your mom I think of her often and wish that we had the chance to go to the MGM casino.. ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€
